name: Blood shop
description:
How to play:

You are a blood seller. But someone put silver in all your blood storage. To sell blood, you must first clear it from silver.

Also, in blood, you can find some emotions. Vampires very much love to eat emotions. So sometimes they might ask you to give them blood with emotions.

 

How to clean blood:

To clean blood, go to the room where blood is coming out.

In the middle of the room, you can find a box. Take a bottle and place it on the box.

Then click on the box to open it. Destroy all silver particles by clicking on them.

To close the box, click the arrow button.

 

How to sell blood:

To sell blood, drag a cleaned bottle of blood onto the conveyor.

Find the room where the bottle is. Then transport this bottle to a glass vessel.

You can put all the ingredients there. When you are ready, click on a faucet.

Take the result and drop it on the conveyor. This bottle of blood will be in the customer room.

Drag and drop this bottle to the customer.

 

The Upgrade:

  • Auto-Sort: 100 coins.

It can sort blood and emotions into different containers.

  • Conveyor speed: 50 coins.

increasing conveyor speed.

  • A bottle of blood: 20 coins.

This will put blood in your storage. But first you have to have storage.

  • Bottles of emotions: 20 coins.

This will put each emotion in your storage. But first you have to have storage.
